title: Find your next home @ Villas de las Colinas 4! Now leasing 1x1!
posting_body: ['Find your new home in our vibrant little community located in South Chamblee.', 'We offer 1 and 2 bedroom apartment homes ranging across 3 separate floorplans as well as a townhome option.', 'Enjoy the convenience of being close to MARTA train and bus routes.', "Locations such as the Plaza Fiesta, Sam's Club, DeKalb-Peachtree Airport, the I-85, and Highway 400 are also nearby.", 'Unit features include fireplaces, wet bars, refrigerators, and large closets.', 'Resident access to our picnic area, clubhouse, and swimming pool as well as community events help to build a great community atmosphere.', '1 & 2 Bedroom Units, 3 Floor Plans, 1 Townhome option', 'Bilingual staff - Se habla español!', 'Central Heating & Air', 'Swimming Pool', 'Planned Community Events', 'Online Tenant Services', 'Clubhouse', 'Picnic Area', 'Playground', 'Pet Friendly', 'Wi-fi Access', 'All Electric', 'Refrigerator Provided', 'Wet Bar', 'Easy Care Flooring', 'Fireplace', 'Ceiling Fans', 'Large Closets', 'Grill Stations', 'Landscaped Grounds', 'Patio / Balcony', 'High Speed Internet Access', 'Onsite Leasing Office', '24 Hour Emergency Maintenance', 'Office hours: M-F 9-6 | Saturday 10-4', 'Call today:', 'show contact info']
